__max_hole_diameter: Maximum diameter that the hole filler will consider a hole. If hole is larger than this value, it will not fill on that axis.  Default is 12. Min is 3. Max is 32
__max_hole_volume: Maximum number of blocks that can be placed per hole. Default is 500. Min is 1. Max is 5000
__undo_timer: How long before Curing Blocks are converted to dirt, in seconds. This is an approximation as some randomness is involved. Default is 15. Min is 1. Max is 120
__fill_speed: How many Curing Blocks placed per tick. Default is 5. Min is 1. Max is 120
__is_dirt_free: If true, dirt isnt required in the players getInventory()
__smart_preserve: If true, will fill majority of hole with dirt, leaving only surface blocks to match the environment
__smart_preserve_: Recommended to set is_dirt_free to true
__smart_preserve_fill_block: The block the smart_preserve uses from your getInventory()
__smart_preserve_fill_block_: This is ignored if is_dirt_free is true
__smart_preserve_fill_block__: Options: cobblestone, stone, dirt. Default is cobblestone
__max_water_diameter: Maximum diameter that the hole filler will consider a hole. If hole is larger than this value, it will not fill on that axis.  Default is 18. Min is 3. Max is 32
__max_water_volume: Maximum number of blocks that can be placed per hole. Default is 800. Min is 1. Max is 5000
__torch_places_n_light_sources: How many light sources can the Light Hole Filler place per torch in the players inventory.  Default = 6
__torch_return_rate: What percentage of the light sources placed by the Light Hole Filler will the player get back.  Default = 70%
